extensionDescription.message: Hide the YouTube™ fullscreen controls when you move the cursor to the display border.

triggerDistanceOptionTitle.description: Title of the trigger distance option

triggerDistanceOptionDescription.message: The threshold, from each site, at wich the controls will be hidden. All values in pixel. Use "-1" to disable one site.
triggerDistanceOptionDescription.description: Description of the trigger distance option

useHotkeyOptionTitle.description: Title of the trigger use hotkey option

onlyHotkeyOptionTitle.description: Title of the only hotkey option

onlyHotkeyOptionDescription.message: Player controls can only be toggled via hotkey and mouse movement will be ignored.
onlyHotkeyOptionDescription.description: Description of the only hotkey option

hotkeyOptionDescription.message: The hotkey that toggles the YouTube controls

invertTriggerOptionTitle.description: Title of the invert trigger option

invertTriggerOptionDescription.message:
Inverts the function of the hotkey and the mouse trigger so that they make the controls visible instead of hiding them. This also hides the full screen controls by default.
Try 70 as trigger distance for the top and bottom.
invertTriggerOptionDescription.description: Description of the invert trigger option

onlyFullscreenOptionTitle.description: Title of the only fullscreen option

onlyFullscreenOptionDescription.message: Only hide the controls when the YouTube™ video is in fullscreen mode.
onlyFullscreenOptionDescription.description: Description of the only fullscreen option
